TextLibrary.Text: There's no sign of the Archive. Maybe we should talk to the local settlers.
There's no sign of the Archive. Maybe we should talk to the local settlers.
This system is home to Degani farmers. They are not likely to know very much.
This system is home to Degani farmers. They are not likely to know very much.
Then perhaps we should just continue our search along the rim.
